docs.snippet: The deployment of the U.S. military's THAAD anti-missile defense system in South Korea will be complete in one to two months and it will be operational as early as April, South Korea's Yonhap news agency reported on Tuesday, citing the country's m...
docs.lead_paragraph: The deployment of the U.S. military's THAAD anti-missile defense system in South Korea will be complete in one to two months and it will be operational as early as April, South Korea's Yonhap news agency reported on Tuesday, citing the country's military.
